reviews.review:
Not my favorite MCU movie, but still pretty darn awesome.  Can't wait to see it again to pick up on things I missed (thanks SMG for being the most distracting environment to see a movie EVER).  And Captain Marvel and Avengers 4 can't come out soon enough!!!!

And yes - one bonus scene at the very end of the credits.  After sitting still for 150 minutes, do yourself a favor and go use the bathroom before that scene.  Trust me - you have time.
I can barely breathe. This is hands down my favorite movie of all time. It had the balls to do what no one thought they would do!
From the moment it begins to when it ends, it will stick with you long after the movies over

This movie lacked a strong ending and supported itself on the sheer values and (strength) of its main characters popularity.  It left the crowd wondering and wishing for more than they had been presented with. The quick change in story lines took me out of the moment while also leaving you with a sick, unfinished taste in your mouth.  While this movie was enjoyable, it can he considered as one of the worst endings of all time in marvel history.

Infinity War delivers everything I've been waiting for, for the past decade. I can't stress how well Thanos was done and the feelings I had for him by the end of the movie. From start to finish this film delivers non-stop action and gives us great interaction with all of our favorite characters. This is one for the ages. If you're a superhero fan....there's no way in hell you will not love every second of this!!!
Great movie but super painful for hardcore fans

Such a confusing hodgepodge that could have been funny instead of stupid and could have made sense but didn't.  When they are trying to remove the super weapon from the villain they could have just cut off his arm instead.  The ending was extreme and terrible and we were all disappointed.  Interesting to see the mix of characters but it just turned into overload.

True to the Canon. This movie fills everyone's want and needs for anything they've missed in awaiting for a live action infinity gauntlet adaptation.  Very well done.  I will have to see this one a few times too catch all the goodies hidden within
Fantastic movie, if you are a fan of the MCU you need to see it sooner, not later, so much that can be spoiled and someone will ruin elements of the film if you wait.
A bittersweet rendition of everything one enjoys in Marvel movie. Gripping though out and worth the bladder infection to see every minute.
